# `{ieaexplorer}`

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Installation

You can install and run the development version of `{ieaexplorer}` like so:

```{r}
remotes::install_github("TanguyGen/IEAExplorer")
ieaexplorer::run_app()
```

or install this repository and run:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(shiny)
runApp()
```

## About

IEAExplorer is an app made to visualise and download time series, using the ATAC analysis (Analysis of Trend And recent Changes) for different marine socio-ecosystems.
The time series include data on ocean climate, ecology, human pressure and sectors.
